title: Stadialist
description:
Stadialist aims to cover the stories of the arenas that are home to the world's beautiful game.

(Football incase you were wondering).

Since 2018, in one way or another we've sought to uncover stories, facts and data points of the world's greatest stadiums. Stadialist is mainly the brainchild of a football nerd who lost far too much of his youth to 20+ season saves on Football Manager.
